To row names

Source: R/dataframes.R
to_row_names.Rd

Converts a column to row names

Usage

to_row_names(data, row_names = 1L)

Arguments

data

A data.frame

row_names

The numeric position of the column.

Value

A data.frame

Examples


x <- data.frame(
  a = 1:4,
  b = letters[1:4]
)

to_row_names(x)
#>   b
#> 1 a
#> 2 b
#> 3 c
#> 4 d
to_row_names(x, "b")
#>   a
#> a 1
#> b 2
#> c 3
#> d 4
